data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID, COURT_ORDER_NUMBER, COLLECTION_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_DATE, OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (COLLECTION_DATE = @collectionDate) and (COLLECTION_AMOUNT = @collectionAmount) and (OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR = @oblgorPrsnNbr) and (COURT_ORDER_NUMBER = @courtOrderNumber) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptSourceType
data.value: select top(1) CR_SRCE_TYPE_ID, CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_CRSRC_TYPE where (CODE = @code) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)
